name: zoetrope
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device used in the past consisting of a cylinder with slits (= long, narrow holes) cut in it and a series of images drawn on the inside. When the cylinder is turned, a person looking through the slits sees the images appear to move. : The museum also has a zoetrope, which reveals a series of moving images as the drum revolves.
